title: The Walking Dead: A New Frontier
notes: Nothing happens when trying to launch the game, tried different Steam launch options and disabling overlays.

title: The Walking Dead: A New Frontier
notes: Micro-stutters, possibly due to game's inbuilt Vsync. Turning off Allow Flipping in Nv control panel helps alleviate the issue somewhat.

title: The Walking Dead: A New Frontier
notes: Performance like native and online connectivity seems to work.
Minor stutters for a few seconds when loading new areas, other than that it works perfectly. Completed the game and experienced no bugs or crashes
